name: MEGAMAN IN SUPER MARIO BROS
description:
-----just a Fan Game is not endorsed by nintendo-----

join this game and survive the Marian attacks.

Control

Move, Jump use the arrow keys on the keyboard to move or the W, A, D keys

Key C Special, Contains 3 different Specials

Run or fly overhead, Quickly press back or forward arrow or A, D

Z Key Attack

Keep pressing the Z Key for super attack

Pause game Enter key

the game has support for GamePad, you can play with PS2USB, Will, Xbox controller etc ...

Full Screen Q, E Keys #fangame #adventure #action #platformer #survival #shooter
